review: I am very disappointed in this item.  It worked well for the first three weeks or so.  Now, it will operate properly for only a few hours at a time.  After a few hours, the "system" will go into a loop where it will ask if you would like to place it into "Sleep Mode."  Then, it will continuously scroll through viewing options very quickly for a period of time.  After this, it goes back to the sleep screen.  All of this happens without any real user interaction.  I started this loop by pressing the Home button.  If you unplug it from everything and leave it overnight, it seems to figure itself out.  This has been going on for a couple of months.  Of course, it is past the return/replace cut-off date.  My advice, don't waste your money on this.
author: James S.
